hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Sauvegarde db sur la PROD ssh root@vps490005.ovh.net "runuser -l aloa -c 'cd solution_ce_arcmo; mysqldump -u solution_ce_arcmo -p\"Palmier-10\" solution_ce_arcmo > ../database_saves/ARCMO/export_database_arcmo_$(date +%Y-%m-%d).sql'"
# Récupération des sauvegardes db de la PROD cd /var/lib/jenkins/HOME/WebCE_Arcmo/database_saves/ rsync -avz root@vps490005.ovh.net:/var/www/database_saves/ARCMO/ .
# Suppression des sauvegardes db sur la PROD ssh root@vps490005.ovh.net 'rm -r /var/www/database_saves/ARCMO/*'
